channel.title: Community Project - Xen Fan-made remake
channel.description:
Hello everyone ! First, I want to show you my own Xen map made in Hammer. Here it is : [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9ltjVjpDVqo&list=UU94XCQw2inkErs6YafS-jDg&index=1&feature=plcp']link[/url]
But don't forget it's just alpha. I wanted to make these maps well ... maybe just for fun :smiley: I hope it's good because it's my first mapping project. I'm going to remake all chapters from Xen to End game. If anyone wants to help with anything , I'm sure there is something you could do. Tell me what you think. I'm working on it because I just can't wait (and I don't know for how long) for the developers to finish real xen remake. I'm not saying they won't release it, I just want to share it with the rest of the community so they're waiting for original xen will be less painful.
[COLOR='SandyBrown'][b]DOWNLOAD SECTION :[/b]
[COLOR='Red'][b][u]XEN FIRST CHAPTER ALPHA VERSION RELEASED[/u][/b] : [url='https://www.mediafire.com/?7gxc3or3h8xkq3y']CLICK HERE TO DOWNLOAD[/url] TO PLAY THIS MAP OPEN YOUR BLACK MESA CHEAT CONSOLE BY GOING INTO OPTIONS, KEYBOARD, Enable developer console and then type this in console : map bm_c4a1
[COLOR='Red'][b][u]XEN FIRST CHAPTER BETA VERSION RELEASED[/u][/b] - [url='https://www.mediafire.com/?44keb1wmi953owb#!']CLICK HERE TO DOWNLOAD[/url] [COLOR='Magenta']NEW !!!!! CHANGED THINGS FROM APLHA VERSION : - new water shader in water lakes - more particles - improved texture quality - more xen details - few reflections - new menu system ( optional ) - added "secret locations" - scientists replaced with hev suit scientists
[COLOR='sandybrown'][b]VIDEO AND MEDIA :[/b]
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=biVfAWXJNZU&feature=plcp']VIDEO STAGE 2 HERE[/url] (17.11.2012)
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FLXAxW5Rc_8&list=UU94XCQw2inkErs6YafS-jDg&index=1']ALPHA VERSION VIDEO HERE[/url] (09.12.2012) : This is alpha version of my xen map and it means that it's still not so well designed. It needs much development yet. But already I did much more than in the last version. I added custom gravity, improved ligting, changed skybox (requested), added more background sounds, I also improved displacements in my map so it's less squarish now, and I added more details. Hope you enjoy, I hope so because I put much work into this one.
[b]EARLY BETA VERSION VIDEO [/b]- [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0l6_VeIA8N4&list=UU94XCQw2inkErs6YafS-jDg&index=1']CLICK HERE[/url]
UPDATE (09.12.2012) Here are some new screenshots of Alpha release. Old ones were deleted because there's no point in keeping them anymore in this thread :
![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg)
![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg)
![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg)
![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg)
![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg)
![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg)

item.title: Community Project - Xen Fan-made remake
item.dc:creator: Necroverse
item.description:
Okay I know that its been like over 2 years since you released this map, but I just wanted to say that the last picture is cool. It supports my theory that when the Resonants Cascade happened that not only did stuff from Xen teleport in, but stuff from Earth teleported to Xen. That kinda explains why half the facility was destroyed and why the power didn’t work in them.

Read full topic

item.title: Community Project - Xen Fan-made remake
item.dc:creator: poisonheadcrab
item.description:
I’m not sure what direction you are taking with Gonarch’s lair but I would like to give my suggestion. Since Gonarch has yet to be implemented I think the chapter should at least be a headcrab nest like level. Maybe gonarch’s sack could be placed in certain areas, infinitely spawning headcrabs.

Read full topic

item.title: Community Project - Xen Fan-made remake
item.dc:creator: Xeoxer
item.description:
I predict that Xen will be finished in April or May (pure estimation). Your work is really good, but:

  • those hanging sentries that shoot you with purple beam look likethose from HL1 - too blocky
  • portal to Gonarch should be needed to be activated somehow
  • remake floating islands
  • reoptimize fall damage areas / lower the gravity

Read full topic

item.title: Community Project - Xen Fan-made remake
item.dc:creator: D3lta
item.description:
With overreacting I ment that Xen will probably not take more years.

Read full topic

item.title: Community Project - Xen Fan-made remake
item.dc:creator: HECU_MARINE
item.description:
TehBoxNoob:

You are overreacting.
Besides Black Mesa’s Xen will have better quality then this, since it already takes 4 minutes to get to Gonarchs lair.
As for the map itself, I suggest you make the transition to Gonarchs Lair longer.
And change the texture scale on faces of the island, because it very noticable.
Also I’d suggest to recreate the moving islands, since you are now using HL1’s islands.

I didin’t say Black Mesa’s Xen will be worse. It will be better. I’m the only person working on it, and they have entire team for this. I do it for fun because I don’t want to wait for BM xen.

Read full topic
